flawed_nl_solution:
He shoots 200*4=<<200*4=800>>800 shots per week
He can recover 800*0.2=<<800*0.2=160>>160 of those arrows
So he uses 800-160=<<800-160=640>>640 arrows a week
The cost for those arrows would come out to 640*5.5=$<<640*5.5=3250>>3250 per week
His team pays for 3250*0.7=$<<3250*0.7=2275>>2275 of that
So he has to pay 3250-2275=$<<3250-2275=975>>975 per week for arrows
#### 975

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3520, not 3250. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
